title: Someone help
content:
I am able to access my pesuacademy portal however since friday, my parents arent. I mailed them but no reply. I was planning to goto college but I'd rather study for esa. And go on exam day.   
Someone tell me where i should go for this, COE or somewhere else? (EC Campus)

comments.body: If it's a login issue, reach out to the PESU academy team. Their email will usually be on the website or you can get it from their past emails.
Maybe there is an app update. Dm'ed you and emails id to contact IT if you still need help
maybe they misstyped? sometimes a maintaience error happens when noone can enter. this clears on its own
